meanings.definition: relating to the practice of preserving a dead body by freezing it in the hope of restoring it to life in the future
meanings.sent1: The cryonic chamber kept the body frozen for years.
meanings.sent2: The cryonic process aims to revive the deceased in the future.
meanings.sent3: The cryonic freezer was so cold, it felt like a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent4: Her hope for a cryonic revival was as icy as the frozen body.
meanings.sent5: The cryonic preservation was like pressing pause on life itself.

meanings.definition: the process or technique of cryonics
meanings.sent1: Scientists study cryonic to understand freezing techniques.
meanings.sent2: The cryonic of preserving bodies is a complex field.
meanings.sent3: The cryonic process seemed like a magical way to cheat death.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cryonic, time stands still for the frozen.
meanings.sent5: The cryonic procedure was a glimpse into a possible future revival.
